verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He is exalted,
The King is exalted on high,
I will praise Him.
He is exalted,
Forever exalted
And I will praise His name!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He is the Lord,
Forever His truth shall reign.
Heaven and earth
Rejoice in His holy name.
He is exalted,
The King is exalted on high!
